CustomField.description: Total time Do Not Disturb per day.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( Do_Not_Disturb__c ),null,
IF((MOD(( Do_Not_Disturb__c /60)/60,1)*60) >= 10,
TEXT(FLOOR( ( Do_Not_Disturb__c/60 )/60)) + "h : " + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( Do_Not_Disturb__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min",
TEXT(FLOOR( ( Do_Not_Disturb__c/60 )/60)) + "h : 0" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( Do_Not_Disturb__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min"
))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total time Do Not Disturb per day.
CustomField.label: Total Do Not Disturb
